# Ivan Pozdnovskii - Web Developer

> Modern Website development with Astro, Webstudio, Webflow, and Shopify. Expert in site speed optimization, SEO, and accessibility for higher rankings.

## Contact

- Website: https://weblateweb.dev
- GitHub: https://github.com/Pozdnovskii
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ivan-pozdnovskii

## Expertise

- **Astro** - Static site generation, modern web architecture
- **Tailwind CSS** - Utility-first CSS framework
- **SEO Optimization** - Technical SEO, Core Web Vitals
- **Web Accessibility (a11y)** - WCAG compliance, semantic HTML
- **Web Performance** - Optimization, lazy loading, critical CSS
- **Webflow** - No-code development
- **Webstudio** - Visual development
- **Shopify** - E-commerce development

## Principles

- Performance-first development
- SEO-optimized architecture
- Accessibility for all users
- Clean, scalable code
- Modern web standards

## Technologies

### Frontend
- Astro 5.x
- Tailwind CSS 4.x
- Vanilla JavaScript
- Anime.js (animations)

### Tools
- TypeScript
- Git
- Prettier

## Services

- Website Development
- SEO Optimization
- Performance Audits
- Accessibility Consulting
- Site Speed Optimization
